org.apache.flink.graph

类 Edge<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple3<K,K,V>
        • org.apache.flink.graph.Edge<K,V>
  • 类型参数:
    K - the key type for the sources and target vertices
    V - the edge value type
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Edge<K,V>
extends Tuple3<K,K,V>
    An Edge represents a link between two vertices, the source and the target and can carry an attached value. For edges with no value, use NullValue as the value type.
    另请参阅:

    • 方法详细资料

      • reverse

        public Edge<K,V> reverse()
        Reverses the direction of this Edge.
        返回:
        a new Edge, where the source is the original Edge's target and the target is the original Edge's source.
